authors.name: Wai   Kit Lam (Leo)
authors.affiliation: Laboratory of Michael Lazarou (Team Hurley) at Monash University

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cl5hc","text":"There are eight main steps in preparing EM sample, including fixation, en bloc staining, agarose embedding, dehydration, infiltration, resin embedding, resin-embedded sample trimming and ultrathin sectioning.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfmjg","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2dck9","text":"This EM sample preparation protocol is established by Benjamin Padman and slightly modified by Wai Kit Lam and Runa Lindblom. Of note, this protocol is designed for processing cultured cell sample.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

creator.name: Dorotea  Fracchiolla
creator.affiliation: Sascha Martens lab, University of Vienna, Max Perutz Labs - Vienna (AT)

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"936fm","text":"List of reagents ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dl1n","text":"0.2 M Phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8fmob","text":"0.2 M sodium-cacodylate (NaCac) (pH 7.4) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1k1a3","text":"16 % Paraformaldehyde solution, EM grade ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"80aku","text":"25 % Glutaraldehyde solution, EM grade ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bgo91","text":"2 % osmium tetroxide (OsO4) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"30vr0","text":"Potassium ferricyanide (K3Fe(III)(CN)6) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1gk61","text":"Uranyl acetate (UA) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o1n2","text":"Lead citrate ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9a2rh","text":"Agarose, low-gelling point ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6a24","text":"70 %, 80 %, 90 %, 95 %, 100 % Ethanol ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5v49g","text":"Propylene oxide ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8r3oi","text":"Dodecenylsuccinic anhydride (DDSA) ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"848h8","text":"Araldite 502 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7cube","text":"Procure 812 ","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rhlp","text":"Benzyldimethylamine (BDMA)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bn2m9","text":"Aspirate cell culture media then fix cells with pre-warmed phosphate-buffered 4% Paraformaldehyde (PFA) at   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":107,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":113,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cevs8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EDB28FE0699811EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"","unit":32}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"F07C1020699811EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"emaa","text":"Wash cells twice with   sodium-cacodylate (NaCac)   buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":50,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"36gk3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"DD404C506FE311EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"1":{"type":"ph","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"D557EA206FE311EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"number":"7.4"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6ugta","text":"Post-fix the sample with   glutaraldehyde in   NaCac buffer for   at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":45,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":64,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":69,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7ttld","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"E60700906FE311EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1498}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"FA084F406FE311EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":86400,"guid":"FB9985A0699811EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FE3BA7C0699811EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"erk8b","text":"Wash cells three times with   NaCac buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4bu9n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"082597406FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"79agf","text":"Post-fix the sample with   osmium tetroxide (OsO4),   Potassium ferricyanide (K3Fe(III)(CN)6) in   NaCac buffer   for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":52,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":97,"length":1},{"key":3,"offset":112,"length":1},{"key":4,"offset":118,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5kqj9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"0D25CDA06FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1498}},"1":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"1.5","error_concentration":false,"guid":"124A06C06FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1498}},"2":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"0.1","error_concentration":false,"guid":"1EA924006FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":21}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"066A3AB0699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"","unit":165}},"4":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"09F81C60699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b309i","text":"Bring the sample to BioWave Pro microwave (Pelco), and expose it to three microwave dutycycle (  on,   off) at 100W under vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":95,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":101,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9al8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"0E299110699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":120,"guid":"11664580699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cju7q","text":"Rinse cells three times with MilliQ water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b4ofj","text":"Add   uranyl acetate (UA) in MilliQ water to sample, followed by exposing the sample to three microwave duty-cycle (120s on, 120 s off) at 100W under vacuum.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b65f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5oed8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b8ir","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"2","error_concentration":false,"guid":"475A29D06FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1499}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8p1mi","text":"It is best to filter the 2% (w/v) UA using 0.22 µm pore size filter.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8g1oe","text":"Rinse cells three times with MilliQ water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aqnf2","text":"Scrape and pellet ( ) cells in MilliQ water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b5p8o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":180,"guid":"22AD2F20699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"75sgb","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet in   Ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fhagc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"70","error_concentration":false,"guid":"6BBE1CA06FE411EBAA6AA9463CA34731","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":14}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9pgis","text":"Centrifuge the sample again at  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9g1av","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"10000","duration":180,"guid":"2F76F510699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null,"temperature":"","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":34}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"e318u","text":"Gently remove the supernatant (i.e. 70 % Ethanol).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"32ds0","text":"Add one drop of low-melting point agarose to the cell pellet.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8mau9","text":"Vortex and centrifuge the sample immediately.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e70tl","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bajlr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1vonf","text":"The low-melting point agarose must be super-hot (close to 100°C) to achieve step 15.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8urat","text":"Cut the solidified agarose-cell pellet into 1 mm cubes using a razor blade.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e944g","text":"Transfer the agarose-cell pellet cubes to a flat-bottom crew cap tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8sb8r","text":"Perform a microwave assisted dehydration by graduated ethanol series (80 %, 90 %, 95 %, 100 %, 100 % (v/v); each at 150 W for  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":126,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4r38b","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":40,"guid":"4538DF80699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dd1t6","text":"Perform a microwave assisted dehydration by propylene oxide (100%, 100% (v/v); each at 150 W for  ).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":97,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9sccj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":40,"guid":"491E3000699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"513jd","text":"Infiltrate samples with Araldite 502/Procure 812 (Resin) by graduated concentration series in propylene oxide (25 %, 50 %, 75 %1 100 %, 100 % (v/v)); each at 250 W for   under vacuum).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":168,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"18u9t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"9qn3k","text":"","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0t53","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"4CE91AB0699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9afc1","text":"The composition of the Resin is 51.7 % (w/w) DDSA, 18.6 % (w/w) Araldite 502, 26.3 % (w/w) Procure 812 and 3.4 % (w/w) BDMA.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3dms3","text":"Put the infiltrated agarose-cell pellet cubes and the appropriate paper label into the resin-block mould, then fill up the mould with resin.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53b92","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"50fn9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8jhnc","text":"It is important to remove all the bubbles. Usually, some bubbles are trapped under the paper label. It is best to use a pair of forceps to lift-up the paper label to release these bubbles, followed by using a 1 ml plastic transfer pipette to remove them.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7j4fd","text":"Incubate the resin-embedded sample to a   oven for   or until the resin is fully polymerised.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":40,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":51,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"30uc1","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"521AC150699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","temperature":"60","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":172800,"guid":"54E15B60699911EB838569F0E453652D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fgn11","text":"Use a razor blade to carefully trim the resin block to expose the underlying agarose-cell pellet cubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2uign","text":"Create a mirror surface on the agarose-cell pellet cubes using Ultra UCT ultramicrotome (Leica Biosystems) equipped with a glass knife.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ev2rf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c3cpd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1c6ti","text":"Before proceeding to the ultrathin sectioning, the block face must be cleaned, and the edges on the mirror surface must be parallel to each other.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d941l","text":"Cut 70-90 nm sections on an ultramicrotome equipped with a diamond knife (Ultra 45° Diatome).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dfgmj","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"14tv2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"3dle5","text":"Make sure you check the angle of the knife holder. For the Ultra 45° Diatome, the angle needs to be at 6°.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"bk44v","text":"Load the ultrathin sections onto the grid. (Copper side up)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5su48","text":"The grid is ready for TEM imaging.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Electron microscope sample preparation technique_V2
warning: {"blocks":[{"key":"358np","text":"For hazard information and safety warnings, please refer to the SDS (Safety Data Sheet).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
